name: Alienware AW3423DWF
description: {OLED}, {Ultra Wide}, {165Hz}, {3440x1440} - More of a personal upgrade, but this monitor would be a game-changer for both work and watching high production value YouTube content.

name: Versus Socks
description: The only socks I swear by. {Long Length Only} - no ankle or quarter lengths, please! Size: 8-12. Once you go Versus, everything else feels wrong.

name: Wilson Padel Balls X3
description: {Replacement Schedule}: Every 3-4 games for optimal play. Always good to stock up since these disappear faster than my serve accuracy!
